aircraft.value: Hawk Defender - AC-7305-717 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Bleed air temperature exceedance. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 17/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 19/12/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 21/12/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 24/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 27/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
